title: Neighborhood Participation and Community Presence
description: As an IDD community member living in the neighborhood I want to participate in neighborhood life and build local connections So that I am seen as a contributing neighbor, not just someone who needs support
content:
Feature: Neighborhood Participation and Community Presence
  As an IDD community member living in the neighborhood
  I want to participate in neighborhood life and build local connections
  So that I am seen as a contributing neighbor, not just someone who needs support

  Background:
    Given Jordan lives in a group home in a residential neighborhood
    And Jordan wants to be part of neighborhood community
    And Jordan brings joy, friendliness, and presence to the neighborhood
    And the neighborhood_elohim coordinates supported inclusion

  Scenario: Shopping at local stores as recognized customer
    Given Jordan regularly shops at the neighborhood grocery store
    And Jordan knows several store employees by name
    When Jordan visits the store to buy items
    Then the personal_agent provides shopping support (list, budget, navigation)
    And store employees greet Jordan warmly as a regular customer
    And Jordan can complete simple purchases independently
    And Jordan's patronage contributes to local business economy
    And the Value Scanner records Jordan's economic contribution
    And Jordan experiences being a valued community member
    And Jordan's presence enriches the store's community atmosphere

  Scenario: Participating in neighborhood events with support
    Given the neighborhood is holding a summer block party
    And Jordan wants to attend and participate
    When Jordan's support worker helps coordinate attendance
    Then the personal_agent shows event details in accessible format
    And Jordan can decide whether and how long to attend
    And Jordan participates in activities at their capability level
    And neighbors engage with Jordan directly, not just support worker
    And Jordan's presence adds to the community celebration
    And Jordan accumulates care tokens for community participation
    And Jordan experiences neighborhood belonging

  Scenario: Building relationships with neighbors over time
    Given Jordan lives on the same block as many families
    And Jordan walks past neighbors' homes daily
    When Jordan encounters neighbors during daily activities
    Then Jordan greets neighbors with friendliness
    And the personal_agent might provide name reminders if Jordan forgets
    And neighbors increasingly see Jordan as a person, not just disability
    And Jordan develops reputation as the "friendly neighbor"
    And simple conversations build relationship over time
    And Jordan's social contribution to neighborhood is real and valued
    And Jordan experiences genuine community connection

  Scenario: Contributing to neighborhood safety and care
    Given Jordan notices a neighbor's package left in the rain
    And Jordan knows the neighbor from previous interactions
    When Jordan alerts their support worker to the situation
    Then the support worker helps Jordan address the concern
    And the neighbor's package is protected from damage
    And Jordan's observant care contribution is recognized
    And the neighborhood_elohim records Jordan's care action
    And Jordan accumulates care tokens for neighborhood care
    And Jordan experiences being a contributing community member
    And neighbors recognize Jordan as someone who looks out for others

  Scenario: Using neighborhood public spaces independently
    Given Jordan loves visiting the nearby park
    And the park is within safe walking distance
    When Jordan wants to spend time at the park
    Then the personal_agent helps Jordan coordinate timing and safety
    And Jordan can walk to the park with appropriate support level
    And Jordan uses park facilities like any other community member
    And park neighbors see Jordan as a regular park user
    And Jordan's public space usage is a right, not a privilege
    And Jordan experiences freedom and community belonging

  Scenario: Supporting local businesses as valued patron
    Given Jordan visits the neighborhood coffee shop weekly
    And the barista knows Jordan's regular order
    When Jordan enters the coffee shop
    Then the personal_agent might help with ordering if needed
    And the barista greets Jordan by name and remembers their preference
    And Jordan's weekly purchase contributes to business sustainability
    And Jordan experiences being a valued, recognized customer
    And the relationship is genuine, not charity or pity
    And Jordan's economic participation in neighborhood is visible

  Scenario: Navigating neighborhood with wayfinding support
    Given Jordan is learning the neighborhood geography
    And some streets and locations still confuse Jordan
    When Jordan wants to visit a neighbor or shop
    Then the personal_agent provides visual wayfinding assistance
    And the interface shows landmarks and turn-by-turn pictures
    And Jordan's navigation skills improve with accessible support
    And Jordan gains increasing independence in the neighborhood
    And support workers can reduce assistance as Jordan's capability grows
    And Jordan experiences growing autonomy and confidence

  Scenario: Participating in neighborhood informal care economy
    Given Jordan's elderly neighbor sometimes needs help bringing in groceries
    And Jordan is capable of carrying light bags
    When the neighbor needs assistance
    Then Jordan can offer help at their capability level
    And the neighbor accepts Jordan's help graciously
    And Jordan's care contribution is real and meaningful
    And the Value Scanner records Jordan's caregiving
    And Jordan accumulates care tokens for helping neighbor
    And Jordan experiences being a care provider, not just recipient
    And the neighborhood care economy includes Jordan as contributor

  Scenario: Managing neighborhood social challenges
    Given some neighborhood kids sometimes tease Jordan
    And Jordan finds the teasing hurtful and confusing
    When the teasing incidents occur
    Then the personal_agent helps Jordan process feelings
    And the neighborhood_elohim can facilitate education if appropriate
    And supportive neighbors might intervene to protect Jordan
    And Jordan learns strategies for responding with dignity
    And the community addresses ableism through education
    And Jordan's safety and dignity are prioritized
    And Jordan receives support to continue neighborhood participation

  Scenario: Creating neighborhood joy through personal presence
    Given Jordan has an infectious smile and loves greeting people
    And Jordan's positive energy affects everyone they encounter
    When Jordan walks through the neighborhood
    Then neighbors often smile back and feel uplifted
    And Jordan's emotional contribution to neighborhood atmosphere is real
    And the neighborhood_elohim recognizes Jordan's joy-spreading as care work
    And Jordan accumulates care tokens for emotional care contribution
    And neighbors tell stories about "Jordan who makes everyone smile"
    And Jordan's unique contribution to community is celebrated
    And Jordan experiences being valued for who they are

  Scenario: Advocating for neighborhood accessibility improvements
    Given Jordan notices the sidewalk has a dangerous crack
    And the broken sidewalk creates barriers for Jordan and others
    When Jordan reports the accessibility issue
    Then the personal_agent helps Jordan document the problem
    And the neighborhood_elohim routes the report to appropriate authorities
    And Jordan's advocacy contributes to universal accessibility
    And the repair benefits Jordan and other neighbors with mobility challenges
    And Jordan experiences being an active citizen advocating for community
    And Jordan's voice influences neighborhood infrastructure

  Scenario: Celebrating neighborhood milestones as full member
    Given the neighborhood is celebrating its 50th anniversary
    And there's a celebration planning committee
    When Jordan expresses interest in helping plan
    Then the neighborhood_elohim facilitates Jordan's participation
    And Jordan contributes ideas at their capability level
    And committee members include Jordan as a peer planner
    And Jordan's suggestions are considered alongside others'
    And Jordan helps create celebration that includes everyone
    And Jordan experiences being an active neighborhood citizen
    And Jordan's community membership is fully honored
